document_metadata.title: Sentiment Analysis of Microblog Combining Dictionary and Rules

main_content.stated_purpose: Microblogging emotional classification is a key research area based on User-Generated Content (UGC). This paper focuses on distinguishing between positive and negative emotional tendencies in microblogs.
